data.eml:eml: Two new earthworm species (Oligochaeta: Annelida) of the Orinoquia region of Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Celis, Liliana V., Feijoo, Alexander, Rangel-Ch, Orlando (2018): Two new earthworm species (Oligochaeta: Annelida) of the Orinoquia region of Colombia. Zootaxa 4496 (1): 440-447, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4496.1.33
